title: Smart Compact Living
summary: A compact and elegant modular unit ideal for guest homes, ADUs in California, or urban lots.
marketingDescription: Smart Compact Living offers a **refined minimalist layout** with a focus on **natural light and space efficiency**. This modular ADU in California features modern finishes and clean geometry, making it perfect for singles, couples, or as a rental unit. Experience the perfect balance of comfort and functionality in a beautifully designed prefab space that **maximizes every square foot**.

title: Family Smart Unit
summary: A balanced modular home in California designed for young families and flexible use.
marketingDescription: Designed with **growing families** in mind, this modular home in California combines thoughtful space planning with modern amenities. **Open-plan living areas** create a sense of spaciousness, while **smart storage solutions** keep everything organized. This factory-built home is where memories are made, where life happens comfortably and efficiently.
